function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unprecedented demand for IoT solutions","Impact":"Increased reliance on IoT may lead to privacy and security risks","Mitigation":"Implement strict privacy and security protocols for IoT solutions","Technologies":"Encryption, access control, secure data transmission","People":"General public, healthcare workers","Owner":"Technology developers, healthcare institutions"},{"Description":"Inaccuracy, security risks, impersonation, and confidentiality issues of IoT data","Impact":"Compromised data integrity and confidentiality, leading to misleading information and privacy breaches","Mitigation":"Implement strong data encryption, multi-factor authentication, and regular security audits","Technologies":"Encryption, multi-factor authentication, secure protocols","People":"General public, healthcare workers","Owner":"Technology developers, healthcare institutions"}]}
